japanese:
はぁ……。
マジで疲れた……。
translation:
*sigh*
I'm so tired...

japanese:
（今日こそは変装を見破ってやるつもりだったが、
　結局、あいつらに振り回されっぱなしだ）
translation:
(I was planning on exposing their disguises today,
 but in the end,
 I was just thrown for another loop.)

japanese:
（その場では見破れそうなんだが、
　どうしても確信まで持っていけない……）
translation:
(I feel like I could see through their disguises
 on the spot, but I just can't be completely sure...)

japanese:
（あとちょっとな気もするんだが……
　なにかが足りないのか？）
translation:
(I feel like I'm almost there, but...
 is something missing?)

japanese:
（このままじゃ、
　昨日と変わらない結果になっちまう）
translation:
(If I keep going like this,
 will I end up with the same results as yesterday?)

japanese: あっ！　上杉君！
translation: Ah! Uesugi-kun!

japanese:
なんだ、やけに慌てて。
なにかあったのか？
translation:
What's wrong?
You seem flustered.
Did something happen?

japanese: ええと、それが――
translation: Um, well, you see%p-2;――

japanese:
ちょっと！
足を止めているとまた見つかりますよ！？
translation:
Hey! If we stop here,
they'll find us again, you know?!

japanese: 事情は私が説明しておきますから、２人は先に！
translation:
I'll explain the situation,
so you two go ahead!

japanese: そ、それもそうですね。
translation: Y-yes, you're right.

japanese: さあ！　早く！
translation: Well then! Hurry!

japanese: では、また後ほど！
translation: Alright, see you later!

japanese: お、おう。
translation: O-okay.

japanese: で？　なにがあったんだよ？
translation: So? What's going on?

japanese:
……はい。
それが、私たちが公園を散策している間に――
translation:
...Well. While we were taking a stroll
in the park%p-2;――

japanese:
はぁ、はぁ……はぁ～……。
もうダメ……限界……。
translation:
Haah, haah...haahh...
I can't do this anymore... I've hit my limit...

japanese:
もう少しですよ！
頑張ってください！
translation: Just a little bit more! Hang in there!

japanese: うう……。
translation: Ooohh...

japanese: お先に失礼しますね！
translation: We'll be going on ahead, then!

japanese: ……それで？
translation: ...Okay, so?

japanese:
あ、はい。
どうも、この公園に中野　一花が来ているという噂が
ＳＮＳで広まってしまったようなんです。
translation:
Oh, yes.
It seems that a rumor had spread on social media
that Nakano Ichika has come to this park.

japanese:
はあ！？
マジかよ、水族館での騒ぎのせいか！
translation:
What?!
Is it because of the commotion at the aquarium?!

japanese:
恐らくそうでしょう。
それで、聞きつけた一花のファンが
公園に集まってきていて……。
translation:
Most likely.
As a result, fans who heard about it
have gathered in the park...

japanese:
どこへ行っても、誰かしらから
声をかけられてしまうのです。
translation: And, wherever we go, someone will call out to us.

japanese: それで逃げてきたってわけか……。
translation: So, you guys escaped here...

japanese:
ええ。
１人や２人ならいいのですが、
ああも大勢で来られるとかなり怖くて。
translation:
Yes. It's okay if it's just one or two people,
but it's really scary when there are so many.

japanese:
……じゃあ、もしかして
向こうからやってくる集団は
全員一花目当てってことか？
translation:
...So, does that mean that the group 
coming towards us are all after Ichika?

japanese: えっ！？
translation: Eh?!

japanese: 逃げるか。
translation: Let's run.

japanese: 逃げましょう！
translation: Absolutely, let's run!

japanese:
（俺たちは騒ぎに巻き込まれまいと、
　大急ぎで海洋博公園から脱出した）
translation:
(We quickly escaped from Ocean Expo Park,
 determined not to get caught up in the commotion.)

japanese:
（その後、全員で相談した結果、
　騒ぎがこれ以上大きくなる前に
　別の観光地へと向かうことになったのだった）
translation:
(Afterwards, we consulted with each other,
 we decided to head to another tourist spot
 before the situation escalated any further.)
